DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate health care resource utilization work status patient ankylose spondylitis undergoing treatment etanercept compare study evaluation baseline evaluation ASCEND ( 0881A3-402 ) ( NCT00247962 ) study .
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study Evaluating Etanercept Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients complete 16 week treatment complete baseline health care resource utilization questionnaire screen ASCEND study 0881A3402WW participate country . Exclusion criterion : Withdrawal ASCEND study safety reason .
